plot outline: Mila, daughter of miser man, stole his own father's safe locker to buy a iPhone, but caught by her father. While talking with a goon over phone, her father agreed to pay 10 million to him. Mila decided to meet the goon to assist her to take money from her father, but finds Shuvra hitting the goon and his associates. She falls in love with him and consequently they meet again. This meeting ultimately brings them together. But, an accident took four valuable years of both of them and also became the cause of their separation.
title: Niyoti
plot: A tragic story of two hearts those apart due to an accident.

Mila, daughter of miser man, stole his own father's safe locker to buy a iPhone, but caught by her father. While talking with a goon over phone, her father agreed to pay 10 million to him. Mila decided to meet the goon to assist her to take money from her father, but finds Shuvra hitting the goon and his associates. She falls in love with him and consequently they meet again. This meeting ultimately brings them together. But, an accident took four valuable years of both of them and also became the cause of their separation.::wakim
